column2: # Define positive class weight
pos_weight <- sum(training$FraudFound_P == 0) / sum(training$FraudFound_P == 1)
# Train the model with class weights
model1 <- train(
factor(FraudFound_P) ~ .,
data = training,
trControl = ctrl,
method = "xgbTree",
metric = "AUC",
tuneLength = 2,
verbose = TRUE,
objective = "binary:logistic",
eval_metric = "auc",
scale_pos_weight = pos_weight
+ Fold01.Rep1: eta=0.4583, max_depth=8, gamma=7.532, colsample_bytree=0.619, min_child_weight= 7, subsample=0.6630, nrounds=859
